question: Henry has 50 square meters of melon field. There are 45 melons per square meter. Henry can harvest his melons every 6 months. How many melons can Henry harvest within a year?
answer:
Henry has 45*50= <<45*50=2250>>2250 melons on his field.
Henry can harvest his melons 12 / 6 = <<12/6=2>>2 times per year
Therefore Henry can harvest 2250*2 = <<2250*2=4500>>4500 melons per year.
#### 4500
